SCTX:
Begin GaenorTimer

;used to set the time between the appearance of Gaenor's first and second incarnations...


float timer
float daysgoneby

short myday
short doonce



if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif




if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_Natural" == 10 )
	if ( GetPCCell "Mournhold, Temple Courtyard" == 0 )
		if ( "Gaenor"->GetDisabled == 0 )
			"Gaenor"->Disable
		endif
	endif
endif



if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_Natural" >= 10 )
	if ( daysgoneby == 0 )
		set myDay to Day
		set daysgoneby to 1
	endif

	if ( myDay != Day )
		;presumably it went up...
		set daysgoneby to daysgoneby + 1
		set myDay to Day
	endif

	if ( GetPCCell "Mournhold, Temple Courtyard" == 0 )
		if ( daysgoneby > 2 )
			Journal MS_Natural 25
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_Natural" == 25 )
	if ( "Gaenor_b"->GetDisabled == 0 )
		StopScript GaenorTimer
	endif
endif


End GaenorTimer
